00027 // wxWidgets < 2.5.4 compatibility.
00028 // TODO: After officially included in library, remove this section.
00029 #if wxMINOR_VERSION < 5 || ( wxMINOR_VERSION == 5 && wxRELEASE_NUMBER < 3 )
00030 # if wxUSE_UNICODE
00031     #include <string.h> //for mem funcs
00032 
00033     inline wxChar* wxTmemcpy(wxChar* szOut, const wxChar* szIn, size_t len)
00034     {
00035         return (wxChar*) memcpy(szOut, szIn, len * sizeof(wxChar));
00036     }
00037 # else
00038     #define wxTmemcpy memcpy
00039 # endif
00040 # ifndef wxFIXED_MINSIZE
00041 #  define wxFIXED_MINSIZE    0
00042 # endif
00043 #elif ( wxMINOR_VERSION == 5 && wxRELEASE_NUMBER < 4 )
00044     #define wxTmemcpy wxMemcpy
00045 #endif

00050 // This is required for sharing common global variables.
00051 // TODO: Automatic locking mechanism?
00052 class WXDLLIMPEXP_PG wxPGGlobalVarsClass
00053 {
00054 public:
00055 
00056     wxPGGlobalVarsClass();
00057     ~wxPGGlobalVarsClass();
00058 
00059     wxString            m_pDefaultImageWildcard; // Used by advprops, but here to make things easier.
00060 
00061     wxArrayPtrVoid      m_arrEditorClasses; // List of editor class instances.
00062 
00063     wxPGHashMapS2P      m_dictValueType; // Valuename -> Value type object instance.
00064 
00065     wxPGHashMapS2P      m_dictPropertyClassInfo; // PropertyName -> ClassInfo
00066 
00067     // void* so we don't have to declare class in headers
00068     void*               m_dictConstants;
00069 
00070     wxString            m_boolChoices[2]; // default is ["False", "True"]
00071 
00072     wxPGConstants       m_emptyConstants;
00073 
00074     bool                m_autoGetTranslation; // If true then some things are automatically translated
00075 
00076     int                 m_offline; // > 0 if errors cannot or should not be shown in statusbar etc.
00077 };
00078 
00079 extern WXDLLIMPEXP_PG wxPGGlobalVarsClass* wxPGGlobalVars;

00081 #define wxPGUnRefChoices(PCHOICES) \
00082     wxASSERT ( PCHOICES ); \
00083     if ( PCHOICES != &wxPGGlobalVars->m_emptyConstants && PCHOICES->UnRef() ) \
00084         delete PCHOICES

00148 #define WX_PG_IMPLEMENT_EDITOR_CLASS_CONSTFUNC(EDITOR,CLASSNAME,PARENTCLASS) \
00149 wxPGEditor* wxPGEditor_##EDITOR = (wxPGEditor*) NULL; \
00150 wxPGEditor* wxPGConstruct##EDITOR##EditorClass() \
00151 { \
00152     wxASSERT ( !wxPGEditor_##EDITOR ); \
00153     return new CLASSNAME(); \

00180 #if wxPG_EMBED_VARIANT
00181 # define wxPG_SetVariantValue(VALUE) \
00182     ((wxVariant&)*this) = VALUE
00183 # define wxPG_SetVariantWxObjectValue() \
00184     ((wxVariant&)*this) = wxVariant((wxObject*)DoGetValue().GetRawPtr(),m_name);
00185 # define wxPG_SetVariantValueVoidPtr() \
00186     ((wxVariant&)*this) = wxPGVariantToVoidPtr(DoGetValue())
00187 #else
00188 # define wxPG_SetVariantValue(VALUE)            { }
00189 # define wxPG_SetVariantWxObjectValue()         { }
00190 # define wxPG_SetVariantValueVoidPtr()          { }

00199 #define wxPGRegisterValueType(TYPENAME) \
00200     if ( wxPGValueType_##TYPENAME == (wxPGValueType*) NULL ) \
00201     { \
00202         wxPGValueType_##TYPENAME = wxPropertyGrid::RegisterValueType( wxPGNewVT##TYPENAME() ); \
00203     }
00204 
00205 // Use this in RegisterDefaultValues.
00206 #define wxPGRegisterDefaultValueType(TYPENAME) \
00207     if ( wxPGValueType_##TYPENAME == (wxPGValueType*) NULL ) \
00208     { \
00209         wxPGValueType_##TYPENAME = wxPropertyGrid::RegisterValueType( new wxPGValueType##TYPENAME##Class, true ); \
00210     }
00211 
00212 #define wxPG_INIT_REQUIRED_TYPE(T) \
00213     wxPGRegisterValueType(T)
00214 
00215 // Use this with 'simple' value types (derived)
00216 #define wxPG_INIT_REQUIRED_TYPE2(T) \
00217     if ( wxPGValueType_##T == (wxPGValueType*) NULL ) \
00218     { \
00219         wxPGValueType_##T = wxPropertyGrid::RegisterValueType( new wxPGValueType##T##Class ); \
00220     }
00221 
00222 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------
00223 // Editor class registeration macros

00225 #define wxPGRegisterEditorClass(EDITOR) \
00226     if ( wxPGEditor_##EDITOR == (wxPGEditor*) NULL ) \
00227     { \
00228         wxPGEditor_##EDITOR = wxPropertyGrid::RegisterEditorClass( wxPGConstruct##EDITOR##EditorClass() ); \
00229     }
00230 
00231 // Use this in RegisterDefaultEditors.
00232 #define wxPGRegisterDefaultEditorClass(EDITOR) \
00233 if ( wxPGEditor_##EDITOR == (wxPGEditor*) NULL ) \
00234     { \
00235         wxPGEditor_##EDITOR = wxPropertyGrid::RegisterEditorClass( wxPGConstruct##EDITOR##EditorClass(), TRUE ); \
00236     }
00237 
00238 #define wxPG_INIT_REQUIRED_EDITOR(T) \
00239     wxPGRegisterEditorClass(T)

00243 #define WX_PG_IMPLEMENT_SUBTYPE(VALUETYPE,CVALUETYPE,DEFPROPERTY,TYPESTRING,GETTER,DEFVAL) \
00244 const wxPGValueType *wxPGValueType_##VALUETYPE = (wxPGValueType*) NULL; \
00245 class wxPGValueType##VALUETYPE##Class : public wxPGValueType \
00246 { \
00247 public: \
00248     virtual const wxChar* GetTypeName() const { return TYPESTRING; } \
00249     virtual wxPGVariant GetDefaultValue () const { return wxPGVariant(m_default); } \
00250     virtual wxVariant GenerateVariant ( wxPGVariant value, const wxString& name ) const \
00251     { return wxVariant ( value.GETTER(), name ); } \
00252     virtual wxPGProperty* GenerateProperty ( const wxString& label, const wxString& name ) const \
00253     { \
00254         return wxPG_CONSTFUNC(DEFPROPERTY)(label,name); \
00255     } \
00256     virtual void SetValueFromVariant ( wxPGProperty* property, wxVariant& value ) const \
00257     { \
00258         wxASSERT_MSG( wxStrcmp(GetTypeName(),value.GetType().c_str()) == 0, \
00259             wxT("SetValueFromVariant: wxVariant type mismatch.") ); \
00260         property->DoSetValue(value.GETTER()); \
00261     } \
00262     wxPGValueType##VALUETYPE##Class(); \
00263     virtual ~wxPGValueType##VALUETYPE##Class(); \
00264 protected: \
00265     CVALUETYPE m_default; \
00266 }; \
00267 wxPGValueType##VALUETYPE##Class::wxPGValueType##VALUETYPE##Class() { m_default = DEFVAL; } \
00268 wxPGValueType##VALUETYPE##Class::~wxPGValueType##VALUETYPE##Class() { }
00269 
00270 #define WX_PG_IMPLEMENT_VALUE_TYPE(VALUETYPE,DEFPROPERTY,TYPESTRING,GETTER,DEFVAL) \
00271 WX_PG_IMPLEMENT_SUBTYPE(VALUETYPE,VALUETYPE,DEFPROPERTY,TYPESTRING,GETTER,DEFVAL)

00273 //
00274 // Implements wxVariantData for the type.
00275 //
00276 #define WX_PG_IMPLEMENT_VALUE_TYPE_VDC(VDCLASS,VALUETYPE) \
00277 IMPLEMENT_DYNAMIC_CLASS(VDCLASS,wxVariantData) \
00278 VDCLASS::VDCLASS() { } \
00279 VDCLASS::VDCLASS(const VALUETYPE& value) \
00280 { \
00281     m_value = value; \
00282 } \
00283 void VDCLASS::Copy(wxVariantData& data) \
00284 { \
00285     wxASSERT_MSG( data.GetType() == GetType(), wxT(#VDCLASS) wxT("::Copy: Can't copy to this type of data") ); \
00286     VDCLASS& otherData = (VDCLASS&) data; \
00287     otherData.m_value = m_value; \
00288 } \
00289 wxString VDCLASS::GetType() const \
00290 { \
00291     return wxString(wxT(#VALUETYPE)); \
00292 } \
00293 bool VDCLASS::Eq(wxVariantData& data) const \
00294 { \
00295     wxASSERT_MSG( data.GetType() == GetType(), wxT(#VDCLASS) wxT("::Eq: argument mismatch") ); \
00296     VDCLASS& otherData = (VDCLASS&) data; \
00297     return otherData.m_value == m_value; \
00298 } \
00299 void* VDCLASS::GetValuePtr() { return (void*)&m_value; }
00300 
00301 // TODO: When ready, remove GetValueClassInfo
00302 #define WX_PG_IMPLEMENT_VALUE_TYPE_WXOBJ_BASE(VALUETYPE,DEFPROPERTY,DEFVAL) \
00303 class WX_PG_DECLARE_VALUE_TYPE_VDC(VALUETYPE) \
00304     virtual wxClassInfo* GetValueClassInfo(); \
00305 }; \
00306 WX_PG_IMPLEMENT_VALUE_TYPE_VDC(wxVariantData_##VALUETYPE,VALUETYPE) \
00307 wxClassInfo* wxVariantData_##VALUETYPE::GetValueClassInfo() \
00308 { \
00309     return m_value.GetClassInfo(); \
00310 } \
00311 const wxPGValueType *wxPGValueType_##VALUETYPE = (wxPGValueType*) NULL; \
00312 class wxPGValueType##VALUETYPE##Class : public wxPGValueType \
00313 { \
00314 public: \
00315     virtual const wxChar* GetTypeName() const { return CLASSINFO(VALUETYPE)->GetClassName(); } \
00316     virtual wxVariant GenerateVariant ( wxPGVariant value, const wxString& name ) const \
00317     { return wxVariant ( new wxVariantData_##VALUETYPE( (*(VALUETYPE*)value.GetRawPtr()) ), name ); } \
00318     virtual wxPGProperty* GenerateProperty ( const wxString& label, const wxString& name ) const \
00319     { \
00320         return wxPG_CONSTFUNC(DEFPROPERTY)(label,name); \
00321     } \
00322     virtual void SetValueFromVariant ( wxPGProperty* property, wxVariant& value ) const \
00323     { \
00324         const VALUETYPE* real_value; \
00325         wxASSERT_MSG( wxStrcmp(GetTypeName(),value.GetType().c_str()) == 0, \
00326             wxT("GetPtrFromVariant: wxVariant type mismatch.") ); \
00327         wxVariantData_##VALUETYPE* vd = (wxVariantData_##VALUETYPE*)value.GetData(); \
00328         if ( vd->IsKindOf(CLASSINFO(wxVariantData_##VALUETYPE)) ) \
00329             real_value = &vd->GetValue(); \
00330         else \
00331             real_value  = ((const VALUETYPE*)value.GetWxObjectPtr()); \
00332         property->DoSetValue( *real_value ); \
00333     }

00357 #define WX_PG_IMPLEMENT_VALUE_TYPE_VOIDP_BASE(VALUETYPE,DEFPROPERTY,DEFVAL) \
00358 const wxPGValueType *wxPGValueType_##VALUETYPE = (wxPGValueType*)NULL; \
00359 class wxPGValueType##VALUETYPE##Class : public wxPGValueType \
00360 { \
00361 protected: \
00362     VALUETYPE   m_default; \
00363 public: \
00364     virtual const wxChar* GetTypeName() const { return wxT(#VALUETYPE); } \
00365     virtual const wxChar* GetCustomTypeName() const { return wxT(#VALUETYPE); } \
00366     virtual wxPGVariant GetDefaultValue () const { return wxPGVariant((void*)&m_default); } \
00367     virtual wxPGProperty* GenerateProperty ( const wxString& label, const wxString& name ) const \
00368     { \
00369         return wxPG_CONSTFUNC(DEFPROPERTY)(label,name); \
00370     } \
00371     virtual void SetValueFromVariant ( wxPGProperty* property, wxVariant& value ) const \
00372     { \
00373         wxASSERT_MSG( wxStrcmp(GetTypeName(),value.GetType().c_str()) == 0, \
00374             wxT("SetValueFromVariant: wxVariant type mismatch.") ); \
00375         wxVariantData_##VALUETYPE* vd = (wxVariantData_##VALUETYPE*)value.GetData(); \
00376         wxASSERT_MSG( vd->IsKindOf(CLASSINFO(wxVariantData_##VALUETYPE)), \
00377             wxT("SetValueFromVariant: wxVariantData mismatch.")); \
00378         property->DoSetValue((void*)&vd->GetValue() ); \
00379     } \
00380     wxPGValueType##VALUETYPE##Class() { m_default = DEFVAL; } \
00381     virtual ~wxPGValueType##VALUETYPE##Class() { }
00382 
00383 #define WX_PG_IMPLEMENT_VALUE_TYPE_VOIDP_SIMPLE(VALUETYPE,DEFPROPERTY,DEFVAL) \
00384 WX_PG_IMPLEMENT_VALUE_TYPE_VOIDP_BASE(VALUETYPE,DEFPROPERTY,DEFVAL) \
00385     virtual wxVariant GenerateVariant ( wxPGVariant value, const wxString& name ) const \
00386     { \
00387         void* ptr = (void*)value.GetRawPtr(); \
00388         wxASSERT ( ptr ); \
00389         return wxVariant ( ptr, name ); \
00390     } \
00391 }; \
00392 WX_PG_IMPLEMENT_VALUE_TYPE_CREATOR(VALUETYPE)
00393 
00394 #define WX_PG_IMPLEMENT_VALUE_TYPE_VOIDP_CVD(VALUETYPE,DEFPROPERTY,DEFVAL,VDCLASS) \
00395 WX_PG_IMPLEMENT_VALUE_TYPE_VOIDP_BASE(VALUETYPE,DEFPROPERTY,DEFVAL) \
00396     virtual wxVariant GenerateVariant ( wxPGVariant value, const wxString& name ) const \
00397     { \
00398         void* ptr = (void*)value.GetRawPtr(); \
00399         wxASSERT ( ptr ); \
00400         return wxVariant ( new VDCLASS(*((VALUETYPE*)ptr)), name ); \
00401     } \

00412 //
00413 // Use this to create a new type with a different default value.
00414 #define WX_PG_IMPLEMENT_DERIVED_TYPE(VALUETYPE,PARENTVT,DEFVAL) \
00415 const wxPGValueType *wxPGValueType_##VALUETYPE = (wxPGValueType*) NULL; \
00416 class wxPGValueType##VALUETYPE##Class : public wxPGValueType \
00417 { \
00418 protected: \
00419     const wxPGValueType*    m_parentClass; \
00420     PARENTVT                m_default; \
00421 public: \
00422     virtual const wxChar* GetTypeName() const { return m_parentClass->GetTypeName(); } \
00423     virtual const wxChar* GetCustomTypeName() const { return wxT(#VALUETYPE); } \
00424     virtual wxPGVariant GetDefaultValue () const { return wxPGVariant(m_default); } \
00425     virtual wxVariant GenerateVariant ( wxPGVariant value, const wxString& name ) const \
00426     { return m_parentClass->GenerateVariant(value,name); } \
00427     virtual wxPGProperty* GenerateProperty ( const wxString& label, const wxString& name ) const \
00428     { return m_parentClass->GenerateProperty(label,name); } \
00429     virtual void SetValueFromVariant ( wxPGProperty* property, wxVariant& value ) const \
00430     { m_parentClass->SetValueFromVariant(property,value); } \
00431     wxPGValueType##VALUETYPE##Class(); \
00432     virtual ~wxPGValueType##VALUETYPE##Class(); \
00433 }; \
00434 wxPGValueType##VALUETYPE##Class::wxPGValueType##VALUETYPE##Class() \
00435 { \
00436     m_default = DEFVAL; \
00437     m_parentClass = wxPGValueType_##PARENTVT; \
00438     wxASSERT ( m_parentClass != (wxPGValueType*) NULL); \
00439 } \
00440 wxPGValueType##VALUETYPE##Class::~wxPGValueType##VALUETYPE##Class() { }

00470 #define wxPG_BEGIN_PROPERTY_CLASS_BODY2(CLASSNAME,UPCLASS,T,INTERNAL_T,T_AS_ARG,DECL) \
00471 DECL CLASSNAME : public UPCLASS \
00472 { \
00473     WX_PG_DECLARE_PROPERTY_CLASS() \
00474 protected: \
00475     INTERNAL_T      m_value; \
00476 public: \
00477     CLASSNAME( const wxString& label, const wxString& name, T_AS_ARG value ); \
00478     virtual ~CLASSNAME();
00479 
00480 #define wxPG_BEGIN_PROPERTY_CLASS_BODY(NAME,UPCLASS,T,T_AS_ARG) \
00481 wxPG_BEGIN_PROPERTY_CLASS_BODY2(wxPG_PROPCLASS(NAME),UPCLASS,T,T,T_AS_ARG,class)
00482 
00483 #define wxPG_BEGIN_PROPERTY_CLASS_BODY_WITH_DECL(NAME,UPCLASS,T,T_AS_ARG,DECL) \
00484 wxPG_BEGIN_PROPERTY_CLASS_BODY2(wxPG_PROPCLASS(NAME),UPCLASS,T,T,T_AS_ARG,class DECL)
00485 
00486 #define wxPG_END_PROPERTY_CLASS_BODY() \
00487 };

00515 // Implements sans constructor function. Also, first arg is class name, not property name.
00516 #define WX_PG_IMPLEMENT_PROPERTY_CLASS_PLAIN(PROPNAME,T,EDITOR) \
00517 wxPG_GETCLASSNAME_IMPLEMENTATION(PROPNAME) \
00518 const wxPGValueType* PROPNAME##Class::GetValueType () const \
00519 { \
00520     return wxPGValueType_##T; \
00521 } \
00522 const wxPGEditor* PROPNAME##Class::GetEditorClass () const \
00523 { \

00527 #define WX_PG_IMPLEMENT_CLASSINFO(NAME) \
00528 static wxPGProperty* NAME##B (const wxString& label, const wxString& name) \
00529 { \
00530     return wxPG_CONSTFUNC(NAME)(label,name); \
00531 } \
00532 wxPGPropertyClassInfo NAME##ClassInfo = {wxT(#NAME),&NAME##B};
00533 
00534 
00535 // second constfunc and classinfo is for creating properties w/o value from text
00536 // (should be changed to simpler scheme in 1.2)
00537 #define WX_PG_IMPLEMENT_CONSTFUNC(NAME,T_AS_ARG) \
00538 wxPGProperty* wxPG_CONSTFUNC(NAME)( const wxString& label, const wxString& name, T_AS_ARG value ) \
00539 { \
00540     return new wxPG_PROPCLASS(NAME)(label,name,value); \
00541 }
00542 
00543 // Adds constructor function as well.
00544 #define WX_PG_IMPLEMENT_PROPERTY_CLASS2(NAME,CLASSNAME,T,T_AS_ARG,EDITOR) \
00545 WX_PG_IMPLEMENT_CONSTFUNC(NAME,T_AS_ARG) \
00546 WX_PG_IMPLEMENT_CLASSINFO(NAME) \
00547 WX_PG_IMPLEMENT_PROPERTY_CLASS_PLAIN(NAME,T,EDITOR)
00548 
00549 // A regular property
00550 #define WX_PG_IMPLEMENT_PROPERTY_CLASS(NAME,T,T_AS_ARG,EDITOR) \
00551 WX_PG_IMPLEMENT_PROPERTY_CLASS2(NAME,wxPG_PROPCLASS(NAME),T,T_AS_ARG,EDITOR)
00552 
00553 // Derived property class is one that inherits from an existing working property
00554 // class, but assumes same value and editor type.
00555 #define WX_PG_IMPLEMENT_DERIVED_PROPERTY_CLASS(NAME,T_AS_ARG) \
00556 WX_PG_IMPLEMENT_CONSTFUNC(NAME,T_AS_ARG) \
00557 WX_PG_IMPLEMENT_CLASSINFO(NAME) \
00558 wxPG_GETCLASSNAME_IMPLEMENTATION(NAME)
00559 
00560 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------
00561 
00562 #define WX_PG_IMPLEMENT_STRING_PROPERTY(NAME) \
00563 class wxPG_PROPCLASS(NAME) : public wxLongStringPropertyClass \
00564 { \
00565     WX_PG_DECLARE_DERIVED_PROPERTY_CLASS() \
00566 public: \
00567     wxPG_PROPCLASS(NAME)( const wxString& name, const wxString& label, const wxString& value ); \
00568     virtual ~wxPG_PROPCLASS(NAME)(); \
00569     virtual bool OnButtonClick ( wxPropertyGrid* propgrid, wxString& value ); \
00570 }; \
00571 WX_PG_IMPLEMENT_DERIVED_PROPERTY_CLASS(NAME,const wxString&) \
00572 wxPG_PROPCLASS(NAME)::wxPG_PROPCLASS(NAME)( const wxString& name, const wxString& label, const wxString& value ) \
00573   : wxLongStringPropertyClass(name,label,value) \
00574 { } \
00575 wxPG_PROPCLASS(NAME)::~wxPG_PROPCLASS(NAME)() { }

00580 // named CLASSNAME.
00581 #define WX_PG_IMPLEMENT_CUSTOM_FLAGS_PROPERTY2(NAME,CLASSNAME,LABELS,VALUES,ITEMCOUNT,DEFVAL) \
00582 class CLASSNAME : public wxFlagsPropertyClass \
00583 { \
00584     WX_PG_DECLARE_PROPERTY_CLASS() \
00585 public: \
00586     CLASSNAME ( const wxString& label, const wxString& name, long value ); \
00587     virtual ~CLASSNAME(); \
00588 }; \
00589 WX_PG_IMPLEMENT_DERIVED_TYPE(long_##NAME,long,DEFVAL) \
00590 WX_PG_IMPLEMENT_PROPERTY_CLASS(NAME,long_##NAME,long,TextCtrl) \
00591 CLASSNAME::CLASSNAME ( const wxString& label, const wxString& name, long value ) \
00592     : wxFlagsPropertyClass(label,name,LABELS,VALUES,ITEMCOUNT,value!=-1?value:DEFVAL) \
00593 { \
00594     wxPG_INIT_REQUIRED_TYPE2(long_##NAME) \
00595     m_flags |= wxPG_PROP_STATIC_CHOICES; \
00596 } \
00597 CLASSNAME::~CLASSNAME() { }
00598

00607 class CLASSNAME : public wxEnumPropertyClass \
00608 { \

00616 CLASSNAME::CLASSNAME ( const wxString& label, const wxString& name, int value ) \
00617     : wxEnumPropertyClass(label,name,LABELS,VALUES,ITEMCOUNT,value!=-1?value:DEFVAL) \
00618 { \

00620     m_flags |= wxPG_PROP_STATIC_CHOICES; \
00621 } \
00622 CLASSNAME::~CLASSNAME() { }

00628 
00629 // Implementation for user wxColour editor property
00630 
00631 #define WX_PG_IMPLEMENT_CUSTOM_COLOUR_PROPERTY2(NAME,CLASSNAME,LABELS,VALUES,COLOURS,ITEMCOUNT) \
00632 class CLASSNAME : public wxPG_PROPCLASS(wxSystemColourProperty) \
00633 { \
00634     WX_PG_DECLARE_DERIVED_PROPERTY_CLASS() \
00635 public: \
00636     CLASSNAME( const wxString& label, const wxString& name, \
00637         const wxColourPropertyValue& value ); \
00638     virtual ~CLASSNAME (); \
00639     virtual long GetColour ( int index ); \
00640 }; \
00641 WX_PG_IMPLEMENT_DERIVED_PROPERTY_CLASS(NAME,const wxColourPropertyValue&) \
00642 CLASSNAME::CLASSNAME( const wxString& label, const wxString& name, \
00643     const wxColourPropertyValue& value ) \
00644     : wxPG_PROPCLASS(wxSystemColourProperty)(label,name,LABELS,VALUES,ITEMCOUNT,value ) \
00645 { \
00646     wxPG_INIT_REQUIRED_TYPE(wxColourPropertyValue) \
00647     m_flags |= wxPG_PROP_TRANSLATE_CUSTOM; \
00648     DoSetValue ( &m_value ); \
00649 } \
00650 CLASSNAME::~CLASSNAME () { } \
00651 long CLASSNAME::GetColour ( int index ) \
00652 { \
00653     const wxArrayInt& values = GetValues(); \
00654     if ( !values.GetCount() ) \
00655     { \
00656         wxASSERT ( index < (int)m_constants->GetCount() ); \
00657         return COLOURS[index]; \
00658     } \
00659     return COLOURS[values[index]]; \
00660 }
00661 
00662 #define WX_PG_IMPLEMENT_CUSTOM_COLOUR_PROPERTY(NAME,LABELS,VALUES,COLOURS,ITEMCOUNT) \
00663     WX_PG_IMPLEMENT_CUSTOM_COLOUR_PROPERTY2(NAME,wxPG_PROPCLASS(NAME),LABELS,VALUES,COLOURS,ITEMCOUNT)
00664 
00665 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------
00666 
00667 #define WX_PG_IMPLEMENT_CUSTOM_COLOUR_PROPERTY_USES_WXCOLOUR2(NAME,CLASSNAME,LABELS,VALUES,COLOURS,ITEMCOUNT) \
00668 class CLASSNAME : public wxPG_PROPCLASS(wxSystemColourProperty) \
00669 { \
00670     WX_PG_DECLARE_PROPERTY_CLASS() \
00671 public: \
00672     CLASSNAME( const wxString& label, const wxString& name, \
00673         const wxColour& value ); \
00674     virtual ~CLASSNAME (); \
00675     virtual void DoSetValue ( wxPGVariant value ); \
00676     virtual wxPGVariant DoGetValue () const; \
00677     virtual long GetColour ( int index ); \
00678 }; \
00679 WX_PG_IMPLEMENT_PROPERTY_CLASS(NAME,wxColour,const wxColour&,Choice) \
00680 CLASSNAME::CLASSNAME( const wxString& label, const wxString& name, const wxColour& value ) \
00681     : wxPG_PROPCLASS(wxSystemColourProperty)(label,name,LABELS,VALUES,ITEMCOUNT,value ) \
00682 { \
00683     wxPG_INIT_REQUIRED_TYPE(wxColour) \
00684     m_flags |= wxPG_PROP_TRANSLATE_CUSTOM; \
00685     DoSetValue(&m_value.m_colour); \
00686 } \
00687 CLASSNAME::~CLASSNAME () { } \
00688 void CLASSNAME::DoSetValue ( wxPGVariant value ) \
00689 { \
00690     wxASSERT ( value.GetRawPtr() ); \
00691     wxColour* pval = wxPGVariantToWxObjectPtr(value,wxColour); \
00692     m_value.m_type = wxPG_COLOUR_CUSTOM; \
00693     if ( m_flags & wxPG_PROP_TRANSLATE_CUSTOM ) \
00694     { \
00695         int found_ind = ColToInd(*pval); \
00696         if ( found_ind != wxNOT_FOUND ) m_value.m_type = found_ind; \
00697     } \
00698     m_value.m_colour = *pval; \
00699     wxPG_SetVariantWxObjectValue(); \
00700     if ( m_value.m_type < wxPG_COLOUR_WEB_BASE ) \
00701         wxPG_PROPCLASS(wxEnumProperty)::DoSetValue ( (long)m_value.m_type ); \
00702     else \
00703         m_index = GetItemCount()-1; \
00704 } \
00705 wxPGVariant CLASSNAME::DoGetValue () const \
00706 { \
00707     return wxPGVariant(&m_value.m_colour); \
00708 } \
00709 long CLASSNAME::GetColour ( int index ) \
00710 { \
00711     const wxArrayInt& values = GetValues(); \
00712     if ( !values.GetCount() ) \
00713     { \
00714         wxASSERT ( index < (int)GetItemCount() ); \
00715         return COLOURS[index]; \
00716     } \
00717     return COLOURS[values[index]]; \
00718 }
00719 
00720 #define WX_PG_IMPLEMENT_CUSTOM_COLOUR_PROPERTY_USES_WXCOLOUR(NAME,LABELS,VALUES,COLOURS,ITEMCOUNT) \
00721     WX_PG_IMPLEMENT_CUSTOM_COLOUR_PROPERTY_USES_WXCOLOUR2(NAME,wxPG_PROPCLASS(NAME),LABELS,VALUES,COLOURS,ITEMCOUNT)
00722

00727 #define wxPG_SUBID2                     11486

00754 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------

00757 
00758 // This provides base for wxEnumPropertyClass and any custom
00759 // "dynamic" enum property classes.
00760 class WXDLLIMPEXP_PG wxBaseEnumPropertyClass : public wxPGProperty
00761 {
00762 public:
00763     wxBaseEnumPropertyClass( const wxString& label, const wxString& name );
00764 
00765     virtual void DoSetValue ( wxPGVariant value );
00766     virtual wxPGVariant DoGetValue () const;
00767     virtual wxString GetValueAsString ( int arg_flags ) const;
00768     virtual bool SetValueFromString ( const wxString& text, int arg_flags );
00769     virtual bool SetValueFromInt ( long value, int arg_flags );
00770 
00771     //
00772     // Additional virtuals
00773 
00774     // This must be overridden to have non-index based value
00775     virtual int GetIndexForValue( int value ) const;
00776 
00777     // This returns string and value for index
00778     // Returns NULL if beyond last item
00779     // pvalue is never NULL - always set it.
00780     virtual const wxString* GetEntry( size_t index, int* pvalue ) const = 0;
00781 
00782 protected:
00783 
00784     int                     m_index;
00785 };

00787 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------
00788 
00789 // If set, then selection of choices is static and should not be
00790 // changed (i.e. returns NULL in GetPropertyChoices).
00791 #define wxPG_PROP_STATIC_CHOICES    wxPG_PROP_CLASS_SPECIFIC_1
00792 
00793 class WXDLLIMPEXP_PG wxEnumPropertyClass : public wxBaseEnumPropertyClass // wxPGProperty
00794 {
00795     WX_PG_DECLARE_PROPERTY_CLASS()
00796 public:
00797 
00798     wxEnumPropertyClass ( const wxString& label, const wxString& name, const wxChar** labels,
00799         const long* values = NULL, unsigned int itemcount = 0, int value = 0 );
00800     wxEnumPropertyClass ( const wxString& label, const wxString& name, 
00801         wxPGConstants& constants, int value = 0 );
00802     virtual ~wxEnumPropertyClass ();
00803 
00804     virtual int GetChoiceInfo ( wxPGChoiceInfo* choiceinfo );
00805     virtual int GetIndexForValue( int value ) const;
00806     virtual const wxString* GetEntry( size_t index, int* pvalue ) const;
00807 
00808     inline size_t GetItemCount () const { return m_constants->GetCount(); }
00809     inline const wxArrayInt& GetValues() const { return m_constants->GetValues(); }
00810 
00811     inline wxPGConstants& GetChoices() const { return *m_constants; }
00812 
00813 protected:
00814     wxPGConstants*          m_constants;
00815 };

00889 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------
00890 
00891 //
00892 // In wxTextCtrl, strings a space delimited C-like strings. For example:
00893 // "String 1" "String 2" "String 3"
00894 //
00895 // To have " in a string, use \".
00896 // To have \ in a string, use \\.
00897 //
00898 class WXDLLIMPEXP_PG wxLongStringPropertyClass : public wxPGProperty
00899 {
00900     WX_PG_DECLARE_PROPERTY_CLASS()
00901 public:
00902 
00903     wxLongStringPropertyClass ( const wxString& label, const wxString& name = wxPG_LABEL, const wxString& value = wxEmptyString );
00904     virtual ~wxLongStringPropertyClass ();
00905 
00906     virtual void DoSetValue ( wxPGVariant value );
00907     virtual wxPGVariant DoGetValue () const;
00908     virtual wxString GetValueAsString ( int arg_flags = 0 ) const;
00909     virtual bool SetValueFromString ( const wxString& text, int flags );
00910     virtual bool OnEvent ( wxPropertyGrid* propgrid, wxPGCtrlClass* wnd_primary, wxEvent& event );
00911 
00912     //  Shows string editor dialog. Value to be edited should be read from value, and
00913     //  if dialog is not cancelled, it should be stored back and TRUE should be returned
00914     //  if that was the case.
00915     virtual bool OnButtonClick ( wxPropertyGrid* propgrid, wxString& value );
00916 
00917 protected:
00918     wxString    m_value;
00919 };

00923 class WXDLLIMPEXP_PG wxArrayStringPropertyClass : public wxPGProperty
00924 {

00929         const wxArrayString& value );
00930     virtual ~wxArrayStringPropertyClass ();
00931 
00932     WX_PG_DECLARE_BASIC_TYPE_METHODS()
00933     WX_PG_DECLARE_EVENT_METHODS()
00934     virtual void GenerateValueAsString ();
00935 
00936     //  Shows string editor dialog. Value to be edited should be read from value, and
00937     //  if dialog is not cancelled, it should be stored back and TRUE should be returned
00938     //  if that was the case.
00939     virtual bool OnCustomStringEdit ( wxWindow* parent, wxString& value );
00940 
00941     // Helper.
00942     bool OnButtonClick ( wxPropertyGrid* propgrid, wxPGCtrlClass* primary,
00943         const wxChar* cbt );
00944 
00945 protected:
00946     wxArrayString   m_value;
00947     wxString        m_display; // Cache for displayed text.
00948 };
00949 
00950 #define WX_PG_IMPLEMENT_ARRAYSTRING_PROPERTY(PROPNAME,DELIMCHAR,CUSTBUTTXT) \
00951 class wxPG_PROPCLASS(PROPNAME) : public wxPG_PROPCLASS(wxArrayStringProperty) \
00952 { \
00953     WX_PG_DECLARE_PROPERTY_CLASS() \
00954 public: \
00955     wxPG_PROPCLASS(PROPNAME) ( const wxString& label, const wxString& name, const wxArrayString& value ); \
00956     ~wxPG_PROPCLASS(PROPNAME) (); \
00957     virtual void GenerateValueAsString (); \
00958     virtual bool SetValueFromString ( const wxString& text, int ); \
00959     virtual bool OnEvent ( wxPropertyGrid* propgrid, wxPGCtrlClass* primary, wxEvent& event ); \
00960     virtual bool OnCustomStringEdit ( wxWindow* parent, wxString& value ); \
00961 }; \
00962 WX_PG_IMPLEMENT_PROPERTY_CLASS(PROPNAME,wxArrayString,const wxArrayString&,TextCtrlAndButton) \
00963 wxPG_PROPCLASS(PROPNAME)::wxPG_PROPCLASS(PROPNAME) ( const wxString& label, const wxString& name, const wxArrayString& value ) \
00964     : wxPG_PROPCLASS(wxArrayStringProperty)(label,name,value) \
00965 { \
00966 } \
00967 wxPG_PROPCLASS(PROPNAME)::~wxPG_PROPCLASS(PROPNAME)() { } \
00968 void wxPG_PROPCLASS(PROPNAME)::GenerateValueAsString () \
00969 { \
00970     wxChar delim_char = DELIMCHAR; \
00971     if ( delim_char == wxT('"') ) \
00972         wxPG_PROPCLASS(wxArrayStringProperty)::GenerateValueAsString(); \
00973     else \
00974         wxPropertyGrid::ArrayStringToString(m_display,m_value,0,DELIMCHAR,0); \
00975 } \
00976 bool wxPG_PROPCLASS(PROPNAME)::SetValueFromString ( const wxString& text, int ) \
00977 { \
00978     wxChar delim_char = DELIMCHAR; \
00979     if ( delim_char == wxT('"') ) \
00980         return wxPG_PROPCLASS(wxArrayStringProperty)::SetValueFromString(text,0); \
00981     \
00982     m_value.Empty(); \
00983     WX_PG_TOKENIZER1_BEGIN(text,DELIMCHAR) \
00984         m_value.Add ( token ); \
00985     WX_PG_TOKENIZER1_END() \
00986     GenerateValueAsString(); \
00987     return TRUE; \
00988 } \
00989 bool wxPG_PROPCLASS(PROPNAME)::OnEvent ( wxPropertyGrid* propgrid, wxPGCtrlClass* primary, wxEvent& event ) \
00990 { \
00991     if ( event.GetEventType() == wxEVT_COMMAND_BUTTON_CLICKED ) \
00992         return OnButtonClick(propgrid,primary,(const wxChar*) CUSTBUTTXT); \
00993     return FALSE; \
00994 }

01075     virtual bool ArraySet( size_t index, const wxString& str ) = 0;

01137     WX_PG_DECLARE_CUSTOM_PAINT_METHODS()

01139     virtual bool SetValueFromInt ( long value, int );
01140     virtual int GetChoiceInfo ( wxPGChoiceInfo* choiceinfo );
01141 
01142     virtual void SetAttribute ( int id, wxVariant value );
01143 
01144 protected:

01146     wxPGConstants*          m_constants;
01147     wxBitmap*               m_bitmap;

01149     wxPGPaintCallback       m_paintCallback;

01152 };

01156 //
01157 // Tokenizer macros.
01158 // NOTE: I have made two versions - worse ones (performance and consistency
01159 //   wise) use wxStringTokenizer and better ones (may have unfound bugs)
01160 //   use custom code.
01161 //
01162 
01163 #include <wx/tokenzr.h>
01164 
01165 // TOKENIZER1 can be done with wxStringTokenizer
01166 #define WX_PG_TOKENIZER1_BEGIN(WXSTRING,DELIMITER) \
01167     wxStringTokenizer tkz(WXSTRING,DELIMITER,wxTOKEN_RET_EMPTY); \
01168     while ( tkz.HasMoreTokens() ) \
01169     { \
01170         wxString token = tkz.GetNextToken(); \
01171         token.Trim(TRUE); \
01172         token.Trim(FALSE);
01173 
01174 #define WX_PG_TOKENIZER1_END() \
01175     }
01176 
01177 
01178 /*#define WX_PG_TOKENIZER1_BEGIN(WXSTRING,DELIMITER) \
01179     const wxChar* ptr = WXSTRING.c_str(); \
01180     wxString token; \
01181     const wxChar* token_start = NULL; \
01182     wxChar a = 0; \
01183     do \
01184     { \
01185         a = *ptr; \
01186         while ( a == ' ' ) { ptr++; a = *ptr; } \
01187         token_start = ptr; \
01188         while ( a != DELIMITER && a != 0 ) { ptr++; a = *ptr; } \
01189         if ( ptr > token_start ) \
01190         { \
01191             unsigned int str_len = ptr-token_start; \
01192             wxChar* store_ptr = token.GetWriteBuf ( str_len+1 ); \
01193             wxTmemcpy ( store_ptr, token_start, str_len ); \
01194             store_ptr[str_len] = 0; \
01195             token.UngetWriteBuf ( str_len ); \
01196             token.Trim(); \
01197         } \

01205 /*
01206 
01207 #define WX_PG_TOKENIZER2_BEGIN(WXSTRING,DELIMITER) \
01208     wxStringTokenizer tkz(WXSTRING,DELIMITER,wxTOKEN_RET_EMPTY); \
01209     int phase = 0; \
01210     while ( tkz.HasMoreTokens() ) \
01211     { \
01212         wxString token = tkz.GetNextToken(); \
01213         if ( phase != 0 ) \
01214         {
01215 
01216 #define WX_PG_TOKENIZER2_END() \
01217             phase = -1; \
01218         } \
01219         phase += 1; \

01223 
01224 //
01225 // 2nd version: tokens are surrounded by DELIMITERs (for example, C-style strings).
01226 // TOKENIZER2 must use custom code (a class) for full compliancy
01227 // with " surrounded strings with \" inside.
01228 //
01229 // class implementation is in propgrid.cpp
01230 //
01231 
01232 class WXDLLIMPEXP_PG wxPGStringTokenizer
01233 {
01234 public:
01235     wxPGStringTokenizer(const wxString& str,
01236                         wxChar delimeter);
01237     ~wxPGStringTokenizer();
01238 
01239     bool HasMoreTokens(); // not const so we can do some stuff in it
01240     wxString GetNextToken();
01241 
01242 protected:
01243 
01244     const wxString* m_str;
01245     const wxChar*   m_curPos;
01246 #if wxUSE_STL
01247     //wxString        m_buffer;
01248 #endif
01249     wxString        m_readyToken;
01250     wxChar          m_delimeter;
01251 };
01252 
01253 #define WX_PG_TOKENIZER2_BEGIN(WXSTRING,DELIMITER) \
01254     wxPGStringTokenizer tkz(WXSTRING,DELIMITER); \
01255     while ( tkz.HasMoreTokens() ) \
01256     { \
01257         wxString token = tkz.GetNextToken();
01258 
01259 #define WX_PG_TOKENIZER2_END() \
01260     }
01261 
01262 /*
01263 #if wxUSE_STL
01264 
01265 // 2nd version: tokens are surrounded by DELIMITERs (for example, C-style strings).
01266 // TOKENIZER2 must use custom code for full compliancy
01267 // with " surrounded strings with \" inside.
01268 #define WX_PG_TOKENIZER2_BEGIN(WXSTRING,DELIMITER) \
01269     const wxChar* ptr = WXSTRING.c_str(); \
01270     wxString token; \
01271     wxStringBuffer strbuf(token,2048); \
01272     wxChar* store_ptr_start = NULL; \
01273     wxChar* store_ptr = NULL; \
01274     wxChar a = *ptr; \
01275     wxChar prev_a = 0; \
01276     while ( a ) \
01277     { \
01278         if ( !store_ptr_start ) \
01279         { \
01280             if ( a == DELIMITER ) \
01281             { \
01282                 store_ptr_start = store_ptr = strbuf; \
01283                 prev_a = 0; \
01284             } \
01285         } \
01286         else \
01287         { \
01288             if ( prev_a != wxT('\\') ) \
01289             { \
01290                 if ( a != DELIMITER ) \
01291                 { \
01292                     if ( a != wxT('\\') ) \
01293                     { \
01294                         *store_ptr = a; \
01295                         store_ptr++; \
01296                     } \
01297                 } \
01298                 else \
01299                 { \
01300                     *store_ptr = 0; \
01301                     wxASSERT ( (store_ptr-store_ptr_start) < 2048 );
01302 
01303 #define WX_PG_TOKENIZER2_END() \
01304                     store_ptr_start = NULL; \
01305                 } \
01306                 prev_a = a; \
01307             } \
01308             else \
01309             { \
01310                 *store_ptr = a; \
01311                 store_ptr++; \
01312                 prev_a = 0; \
01313             } \
01314         } \
01315         ptr++; \
01316         a = *ptr; \
01317     }
01318 
01319 
01320 #else // wxUSE_STL
01321 
01322 //
01323 // NON USE_STL COMPLIANT VERSION
01324 //
01325 // 2nd version: tokens are surrounded by DELIMITERs (for example, C-style strings).
01326 // TOKENIZER2 must use custom code for full compliancy
01327 // with " surrounded strings with \" inside.
01328 #define WX_PG_TOKENIZER2_BEGIN(WXSTRING,DELIMITER) \
01329     const wxChar* ptr = WXSTRING.c_str(); \
01330     const wxChar* ptr_end = &ptr[WXSTRING.length()]; \
01331     wxString token; \
01332     wxChar* store_ptr_start = NULL; \
01333     wxChar* store_ptr = NULL; \
01334     wxChar a = *ptr; \
01335     wxChar prev_a = 0; \
01336     while ( a ) \
01337     { \
01338         if ( !store_ptr_start ) \
01339         { \
01340             if ( a == DELIMITER ) \
01341             { \
01342                 store_ptr_start = store_ptr = token.GetWriteBuf ( ptr_end-ptr+1 ); \
01343                 prev_a = 0; \
01344             } \
01345         } \
01346         else \
01347         { \
01348             if ( prev_a != wxT('\\') ) \
01349             { \
01350                 if ( a != DELIMITER ) \
01351                 { \
01352                     if ( a != wxT('\\') ) \
01353                     { \
01354                         *store_ptr = a; \
01355                         store_ptr++; \
01356                     } \
01357                 } \
01358                 else \
01359                 { \
01360                     *store_ptr = 0; \
01361                     token.UngetWriteBuf ( store_ptr-store_ptr_start ); \
01362 
01363 #define WX_PG_TOKENIZER2_END() \
01364                     store_ptr_start = NULL; \
01365                 } \
01366                 prev_a = a; \
01367             } \
01368             else \
01369             { \
01370                 *store_ptr = a; \
01371                 store_ptr++; \
01372                 prev_a = 0; \
01373             } \
01374         } \
01375         ptr++; \
01376         a = *ptr; \
01377     } \
01378     if ( store_ptr_start ) \
01379         token.UngetWriteBuf ( store_ptr-store_ptr_start );
01380 
01381 #endif // !wxUSE_STL
01382 
01383 */
